titles: The couragious Turke, or, Amurath the First A tragedie. Written by Thomas Goffe Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford, and acted by the students of the same house.
author: Goffe, Thomas, 1591-1629.
publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, and T. Favvcet, for Richard Meighen,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Bayezid --  I, --  Sultan of the Turks, ca. 1360-1403 --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
